page.title: 14HOW PEOPLE COMMUNICATE
page.content: In these days of ever increasing communications we discovered that although most people have telephones many people still write some letters. Of all the houses we surveyed we found that 29% had no telephone 57% had one telephone and the others had two or more. People also communicate with friends by writing letters. However they are not as frequent letter writers because only 12% would write once a week . The vast majority would perhaps write once a month or even less . It would appear from the study that the people in this area have friends all over the world in places like New Zealand , America , Canada ,Europe and Austalia as well as other parts of the British Isles.
